title: Overview
content: Fletching is one of the fastest skills to train in RuneScape 3 and can be maxed very quickly. It is almost entirely buyable from the Grand Exchange. The most efficient methods involve bulk-making arrows or bow strings rather than cutting bows.
Portable crafters provide a 10% XP bonus to all Fletching actions and should be used throughout training.

title: Levels 1-40: Arrow Shafts and Unstrung Bows
content: Early Fletching training uses a knife on logs to make unstrung bows, or feathers on shafts to make headless arrows.
- Levels 1-5: Arrow shafts from normal logs (15 XP per 15 shafts)
- Levels 5-20: Normal shortbow (u) (5 XP) and longbow (u) (10 XP)
- Levels 20-30: Oak shortbow (u) (16.5 XP) then oak longbow (u) (25 XP)
- Levels 30-40: Willow shortbow (u) (33.3 XP) then willow longbow (u) (41.5 XP)
Purchase logs from the Grand Exchange. Low cost at this stage.

title: Levels 40-55: Headless Arrows
content: Making headless arrows (attaching feathers to arrow shafts) is the fastest XP for the cost at this level range.
- Levels 40+: Headless arrows — 1 XP each but extremely fast to make in bulk
Buy arrow shafts and feathers from the Grand Exchange separately and combine them. This is one of the cheapest Fletching training methods in the game.
Portable crafters give an extra 10% XP here as well.

title: Levels 55-80: Broad Bolts and Maple Bows
content: Broad bolts are a popular mid-level method, especially for players training Slayer who need the Broad Fletching unlock.
- Levels 55+: Broad bolts (3 XP each) — purchase unfinished broad bolts via Slayer points or from the GE; very fast to make
- Levels 50-65: Maple shortbow (u) (58.3 XP) and maple longbow (u) (82.5 XP)
- Levels 65-80: Magic shortbow (u) (83.3 XP) — moderate cost, decent XP
Broad bolts require the Broad Fletching Slayer unlock but offer excellent XP/coin ratio.

title: Levels 80-99/120: Rune and Dragon Arrows
content: High-level Fletching is most efficiently done by attaching metal arrowtips to headless arrows, which can be done incredibly fast.
- Levels 80-90: Rune arrows — attach rune arrowtips to headless arrows (75 XP per 15 arrows)
- Levels 90-99: Dragon arrows — attach dragon arrowtips to headless arrows (150 XP per 15 arrows); best XP per action
- Levels 95-120: Dragon arrows remain the fastest method; supplement with elder bows for variety
With fast clicking and portables, rates exceed 1,000,000 XP/hour at peak efficiency.

title: Boosts and Tips
content: - Portable crafters: 10% bonus XP on all Fletching actions — most impactful boost available
- Modified fletcher's outfit: Up to 6% bonus XP from the full set
- Double XP events: Fletching's low material cost makes it ideal to train heavily during DXP weekends
- Crystallise spell: Enhances logs cut during Woodcutting training to grant bonus Fletching XP when used
- Fletching is often used as a money-making method at high levels by stringing magic or elder bows
